item.description:
I'm out for gaming this week as I'll be in New York attending the annual Toy Fair and seeing some of the games that will hit the U.S. market over the next twelve months.

In my stead, Missy and Joey have offered to host game night at their place in Laconia, starting at the usual time. Joey mentioned that he had made at least one trip to Myriad Games recently, so I presume that the game shelves aren't barren. That said, you might want to bring one or two games just in case...
item.name: Gaming in Laconia (!)
